comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: I think this from St Phillips Church tower looking NW, hence the height. Not from Observatory Hill as described in the Persistent URL. Most of the features, including the Australian Gas Light Company (AGL) gasometer, show up on the 1890 John Sands map - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-rm1280-s1-sd&rg...

comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content:
I agree with 'beachcomberaustralia' - definitely from St Philip's Tower.

Interesting that the AGL site is still controversial in 2011 - over who has to pay for the cleanup before Barangaroo  can proceed!

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Second thoughts (17 months later) - it might have been from the Grosvenor Hotel at the end of Grosvenor Street , or Charlotte Street on this better 1895 map (interactive) - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-rm3443-sd&rgn=0...
